title: Can I read Higher Algebra by Hall and Knight in class 9? - Quora

response.answer_text: Solutions to the problems in the Higher Algebra by Hall and Knight are arranged in a point-wise manner with step-by-step explanations, making them easier to understand. ... It is best for students of Class IX and X to develop an interest in Algebra as it introduces them to several new theorems in a very interesting manner.

Not at all, higher algebra is a very high level book, you should start from elementary algebra from the same author, it starts from the complete beginning and takes you to advanced level very quickly.
